title: Berkshire posts 2Q profit
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Sat, Aug 8, 2015, 06:08 BST - UK Markets closed Berkshire posts 2Q profit Berkshire Hathaway posts profit of $4.01 billion in second quarter Associated Press – 7 hours ago +0.20 
OMAHA, Neb. (AP) _ Berkshire Hathaway Inc. (BRK.B) on Friday reported second-quarter earnings of $4.01 billion. 
The Omaha, Nebraska-based company said it had profit of $1.63 per share. Earnings, adjusted for investment gains, came to $1.58 per share. 
The conglomerate headed by investor Warren Buffett posted revenue of $51.37 billion in the period. 
Berkshire shares have decreased slightly more than 4 percent since the beginning of the year, while the Standard & Poor's 500 index has increased nearly 1 percent. In the final minutes of trading on Friday, shares hit $143.55, a rise of 11 percent in the last 12 months.
